methods.name: connectionDelegateForUrl
methods.description: This method is only called if willHandleURL returns true. See APSConnectionDelegate for further information.

parameters.name: url
parameters.summary: The NSURL representing the end point of this connection.

methods.name: getKeyManagers
methods.summary: Returns an array of objects implementing the X509KeyManager protocol for the SSL Context.
methods.description:
This method is only called if willHandleURL returns true.

Return null to set up a SSL Context with the default system key managers.

methods.name: getTrustManagers
methods.summary: Returns an array of objects implementing the X509TrustManager protocol for the SSL Context.
methods.description:
This method is only called if willHandleURL returns true.

Return null to set up a SSL Context with the default system trust managers.

methods.name: willHandleURL
methods.summary: Returns if the security manager will participate in authentication of this end point.
methods.description:
The parameter passed to this method is a NSURL on iOS and a Uri on android.

Return true to participate, false to allow default authentication flow.

parameters.name: url
parameters.summary: The Object representing representing the end point of this connection.
